questions_and_notes: ocean_mole_content means the column integrated amount so why does this variable have depth0m?  I think depth0m should be removed because the standard_name already provides this information.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Flux of Inorganic Carbon into Ocean Surface by Runoff
comment: Inorganic Carbon supply to ocean through runoff (separate from gas exchange)
